plot: All Charlotte wants from life is to be cut a slice of the agency she has devoted herself to building. But as her ambitions disintegrate, she's thrown into a heart-racing journey of self-discovery, atonement and danger.
title: Keeping Rosy
plot_es: All Charlotte wants from life is to be cut a slice of the agency she has devoted herself to building. But as her ambitions disintegrate, she's thrown into a heart-racing journey of self-discovery, atonement and danger.
plot_en: All Charlotte wants from life is to be cut a slice of the agency she has devoted herself to building. But as her ambitions disintegrate, she's thrown into a heart-racing journey of self-discovery, atonement and danger.
